GSD.product_version: versions from v5.11 to before v6.1.11
GSD.description:
Squashfs: fix handling and sanity checking of xattr_ids count

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.11 by commit a7da7d01ac5ce9b369a1ac70e1197999cc6c9686, it was introduced in version v5.11 by commit 506220d2ba21791314af569211ffd8870b8208fa. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: Squashfs: fix handling and sanity checking of xattr_ids count
